title: Welcome to my website!üëã
text:
EnglishEspa√±ol



Hi there! My name is Anthony Romero, I am a üáµüá™ student of Human Medicine at the Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos.

I am a constant learner who likes to work on Health Data Science projects.

I enjoy experimenting with new technologies and participating in projects with R, Stata and HTML/CSS applied to Health, as well as medical research, biostatistics and clinical and public health epidemiology.
In this blog, you will accompany me on my way to learn programming with R, Stata, etc through tutorials or resources elaborated by me‚Ä¶ and more‚Ä¶


üß† Current status: soon to learn Python :D




Hola a todos! Mi nombre es Anthony Romero, üáµüá™ studiante de Medicina humana en la Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos.

Soy un constante aprendiz que gusta de trabajar en proyectos de Ciencia de Datos en Salud.

Disfruto experimentando con nuevas tecnolog√≠as y participando en proyectos con R, Stata y HTML/CSS aplicados a la Salud, as√≠ como en investigaci√≥n m√©dica, bioestad√≠stica y Epidemiolog√≠a cl√≠nica y de salud p√∫blica.

En este blog, me acompa√±ar√°s en mi camino a aprender a programar con R, Stata, etc a trav√©s de tutoriales o recursos elaborados por m√≠‚Ä¶ y m√°s‚Ä¶


üß† Estado actual: pr√≥ximamente Python :D

A few things about me


RENACYT level VII researcher.

I have collaborated in research projects with the Instituto de Evaluaci√≥n de Tecnolog√≠as en Salud e Investigaci√≥n - EsSalud for the last 12 months.

I have basic skills in data management, analysis and visualization with R and Stata.

I am part of the founding team of InkaStats Academy and a member of ADIECS since 2018.

I am interested in Health Data Science, clinical research and Epidemiology applied to public health.
